issue.title: [Format] Clarify whether 0-length variable offsets buffers are permissible for 0-length arrays in the IPC protocol
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8338](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8338). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This aspect of the columnar format / IPC protocol remains slightly unclear. As written, it would suggest that an offsets buffer of length 1 containing a single value 0 is required. It may be better to allow this to be length zero (corresponding to a 0-size or null buffer in the implementation)
